quiz.question: Which unit is commonly used for speed in motorsports on land?

Which pilot pair set the SR-71 speed record on July 28, 1976?
options: Eldon W. Joersz and George T. Morgan Jr.
William J. Knight and Neil Armstrong
quiz.answer: Eldon W. Joersz and George T. Morgan Jr.
